alert.note: Alert for Camas Prairie (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 2:08PM MST until January 14 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SATURDAY TO 5 AM MST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches Saturday afternoon through Sunday morning. * WHERE...Camas Prairie zone. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 8 PM MST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 2 PM Saturday to 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Cold wind chills will be below zero. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There will be a break in the snowfall tonight before redeveloping Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
